cast.overview: Lyla and Louis, a singer and a musician, fall in love, but are soon compelled to separate. Lyla is forced to give up her newborn but unknown to her, he grows up to become a musical genius.
cast.title: August Rush

details.biography: Aaron Staton (born August 2, 1980) is an American actor. Apart from his long running role on Mad Men, he is most well known for his work in the 2011 video game LA Noire, in which revolutionary motion capture technology was used to bring his performance as Detective Cole Phelps to life. Since 2006, he has been married to actress Connie Fletcher.
details.name: Aaron Staton
